text: Two Gentlemen Sharing is a 1969 British drama movie directed by Ted Kotcheff and was based on the novel of the same name by David Stuart Leslie. It stars Rob Phillips, Judy Geeson, Norman Rossington, Rachel Kempson, Hilary Dwyer, Ram John Holder, Philip Stone, David Markham. ==Other websites== * Category:1969 drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Ted Kotcheff
title: Two Gentlemen Sharing
